    # Apache

    # Configuration

    # Enable



     

    web-servers:
    apache:
        enabled: true

    # Disable



     

    web-servers:
    apache:
        enabled: false

    # Commands

    # start_apache

    # restart_apache

    # stop_apache

    # reload_apache

    # apache_sites

    # create_apache_site

    # Interactive

    # Noninteractive

    # Options
    • --hostname (Server hostname, .e.g --hostname=my-site.loc)
    • --public-dir (Site public directory, .e.g. --public-dir=/vagrant/projects/my-site.loc/public)
    • --php (Enable PHP, .e.g --php=7.3)
    • --overwrite (Overwrite existing configuration)
    create_apache_site \
    --hostname=my-site.loc \
    --public-dir=/vagrant/projects/my-site.loc/public \
    --php=7.3

    # edit_apache_site

    # delete_apache_site

    # Interactive

    # Noninteractive

    # Options
    • --hostname (Server hostname, .e.g --hostname=my-site.loc)
    • --public-dir (Site public directory, .e.g. --public-dir=/vagrant/projects/my-site.loc/public)
    • --php (Enable PHP, .e.g --php=7.3)
    create_apache_site \
    --hostname=my-site.loc \
    --public-dir=/vagrant/projects/my-site.loc/public \
    --php=7.3
    --overwrite

    # delete_apache_site
